channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: May's Conjecture on Bimonoidal Functors and Multiplicative Infinite Loop Space Theory
item.description: arXiv:2405.10834v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: A conjecture of May states that there is an up-to-adjunction strictification of symmetric bimonoidal functors between bipermutative categories. The main result of this paper proves a weaker form of May's conjecture that starts with multiplicatively strong symmetric bimonoidal functors. As the main application, for May's multiplicative infinite loop space machine from bipermutative categories to either E-infinity ring spaces or E-infinity ring spectra, multiplicatively strong symmetric bimonoidal functors can be replaced by strict symmetric bimonoidal functors.
item.dc:creator: Donald Yau

item.title: On multiplicative spectral sequences for nerves and the free loop spaces
item.description: arXiv:2301.09827v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We construct a multiplicative spectral sequence converging to the cohomology algebra of the diagonal complex of a bisimplicial set with coefficients in a field. The construction provides a spectral sequence converging to the cohomology algebra of the classifying space of a topological category. By applying the machinery to a Borel construction, we determine explicitly the mod $p$ cohomology algebra of the free loop space of the real projective space for each odd prime $p$. This is highlighted as an important computational example of such a spectral sequence. Moreover, we try to represent generators in the singular de Rham cohomology algebra of the diffeological free loop space of a non-simply connected manifold $M$ with differential forms on the universal cover of $M$ via Chen's iterated integral map.
item.dc:creator: Katsuhiko Kuribayashi
